title: Home of the Kodavas
creator_contributor_role: Documentary Films of India, production company
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/India - Description and travel

description: Life in the little known state of Coorg in South India. The martial Kodavas, their quaint customs and simple pleasures. Coorg, nestling in a chain of hills, abounds in fertile fields and luxuriant jungles. A land of streams and rivers, including Kaveri the sacred river of the south.
